name: Project Beril / 贝丽尔养成计划
name_original: Project Beril / 贝丽尔养成计划
description:
One day you fell into the virtual world and asked to train an AI.


This is a danmaku game, but you will not challenge the bullet-hell by yourself. Raise an AI to deal with all kinds of danmaku.
In essence, this is a simulation game. You can solve all kinds of difficulties by upgrading AI to fight monsters and adjusting AI parameters!

Note: The main stages of this game are basically operated by the mouse. There is another challenge mode that can be operated with the keyboard or gamepad as the traditional shmups, but it can be assisted by AI.
